lead_paragraph: Twice champion Bernhard Langer believes that up to 40 players are genuine contenders for this week's Masters, with another 30 quite capable of winning the year's opening major championship.

headline.print_headline: Up to 40 Players Are Masters Favorites: Langer
headline.main: Up to 40 Players Are Masters Favorites: Langer

snippet: Twice champion Bernhard Langer believes that up to 40 players are genuine contenders for this week's Masters, with another 30 quite capable of winning the year's opening major championship....
